item.title: Coming soon!
item.author: contact@recommend.games (Recommend.Games)
item.description: This is the start of my new blog about analysing board games and related datasets. If you’re interested, I’d like to know what topics I should write about. Leave a comment below or head over to the BoardGameGeek guild with your suggestions. Hope to see you back here soon!
